title: With our managed databases, you can focus on your applications
description1: Harness the power of your data by maintaining control of your resources.
description2: Choose the right database engine for you from our wide range, and deploy it in minutes. We manage the infrastructure and administration of your managed services.
description3: You save time, money, and are able to focus on your developments and the value your applications bring to your customers.
cardGuidesContent: Find all the guides and tutorials for our managed databases
cardQuickStartContent: Find out how to quickly install your first managed database
cardFreeTierTescription: Try the MongoDB solution for free
cardFreeTierContent: Get a managed MongoDB cluster for free, for life
